original_title: めぐり会いは再び next generation－真夜中の依頼人－ / Gran Cantante!!
overview: A Second Fortuitous Meeting Next Generation -Midnight Girlfriend-  a romantic musical set in the Kingdom of Vespert, with a suprising twist!  "Gran Cantante!!" is Spanish for "brilliant singer." The theme of this revue is a traditional Spanish festival, featuring enchanting Spanish dances and famous songs written about Spain. Enter the glamorous and passionate world of this revue that relies on the current dynamics of Star Troupe, showing off the talents of Rei Makoto, a well-rounded top star.
title: A Second Fortuitous Meeting Next Generation -Midnight Girlfriend- / Gran Cantante!!
